sentences.en: a nostalgic look back at the 1950s
Although we still depict nostalgic snow scenes on Christmas cards, winters are now very much warmer.
sentences.cn: 虽然我们仍在圣诞卡上描绘着具有怀旧气氛的雪景，但现在的冬天比过去暖和多了。

sentences.en: Beijing is for us an old and nostalgic home.
sentences.cn: 北京对我们来说是令人怀念的故乡.

sentences.en: Dixon gave a sad, nostalgic smile.
sentences.cn: 狄克逊脸上露出一丝怀旧的苦笑.

sentences.en: Do you get very nostalgic about those good old days?
sentences.cn: 你是否很怀念那些辉煌的旧时光?

sentences.en: He is nostalgic for the more old you may be more valuable?
sentences.cn: 对怀旧的他来说你可能也是愈老愈值钱 呢 !

sentences.en: I get very nostalgic when I watch these old musicals on TV.
sentences.cn: 我从电视中看到这些旧音乐影片,怀旧之情油然而生.

sentences.en: Many people were nostalgic for the good old days.
sentences.cn: 很多人都很留恋过去的好时光。

sentences.en: Perhaps it is our human nature to be nostalgic.
sentences.cn: 也许是人类天生有一种思古之幽情.

sentences.en: Seeing those old school photographs has made me feel quite nostalgic.
sentences.cn: 看到那些学生时代的旧照片，我不禁产生了怀旧之情。

sentences.en: So, it is why people are so often nostalgic.
sentences.cn: 由此我们就不难看出人类喜欢怀旧的原因.

sentences.en: Somehow the place even smelt wonderfully nostalgic.
sentences.cn: 不知为什么，这个地方竟透出一种浓郁的怀旧气息。

sentences.en: The British music scene is nostalgic, decrepit and moribund.
sentences.cn: 英国音乐呈现出感伤怀旧、暮气沉沉、行将就木的景象。

sentences.en: The film provided an evening of nostalgic viewing.
sentences.cn: 晚上看了一部怀旧的影片.

sentences.en: The poems of nostalgic sentiment and parting with friends are most famous.
sentences.cn: 在这些诗文中,怀旧以及送别内容的诗文是最为著名的.

sentences.en: Why don't I go to give nostalgic ring of encirclement?
sentences.cn: 为什么我走不出怀旧的包围圈?

sentences.en: You tend to be nostalgic, and like things to be as they have always been.
sentences.cn: 你渐渐变得怀旧，喜欢事情一切照旧。

trans.tran_cn: 怀旧的，乡愁的，令人怀念的
trans.tran_en: if you feel nostalgic about a time in the past, you feel happy when you remember it, and in some ways you wish that things had not changed
